name: Diamonds - Skill game - Free version
description:
Old Games - Brand New!
The new no. 1 top app from the USA!
Lots of levels and surprises!

** REMOVE ALL ** ** FIND THE COLORS ** ** FIND THE CHAINS **

Try to beat the highscore and enjoy the beautiful graphics. A highlight for all ages. Clear the board game is a classic which belongs to every app collection.
Yes, it is Free!
